equality-commutativity (math concept)

See also

python declaration class | python inclusion class | python sample

Definition

Definition

equality-commutativity is the well-known and valid inference-rule:

\[\left( x = y \right) \vdash \left( y = x \right)\]

Where:

  • \(x = y\) is a formula-statement of the form \(x = y\)
